Address.value: WORLD TECH CENTRE,,95 HOW MING ROAD, KWUN TONG, K3 0000, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Fenbo Holdings Ltd is a holding company. The Company is mainly engaged in the production and sale of personal care electric appliances, such as electrical hair styling products such as straighteners, curlers, trimmers, and others. The Company also produces toys to overseas markets.
